result.title: Open Platform: Scaling up and out -- Final Platform
result.description: The final deliverable in WP1 describes the final status of the TCBL Open Platform with the gamification tool, AR tracking and experience extraction, cloud services as well as the learning material and guides. Each section gives an overview of the component’s specifications, architecture and how it was taken up by the community. As applicable, business models for commercialising/ operating the components/ services after the end of TCBL are being described.
